name: mcp-agent-eval-suite
description: TypeScript MCP agent evaluation suite with mechanistic and epistemic scoring

scripts.dev: npm run free:3000 && npm run dev:all
scripts.free:3000: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "$port=3000; $listeners=Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalPort $port -State Listen -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; if ($listeners) { $listeners | Select-Object -ExpandProperty OwningProcess -Unique | ForEach-Object { Stop-Process -Id $_ -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Write-Output ('Stopped PID ' + $_ + ' on port ' + $port) } } else { Write-Output ('No listener on port ' + $port) }"
